Package io.github.vincemann.ezcompare

Class RapidEqualsBuilder.CompareConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.vincemann.ezcompare.RapidEqualsBuilder.CompareConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Comparison.FullCompareConfig, Comparison.PartialCompareConfig
    Enclosing class:
    RapidEqualsBuilder
    public static class RapidEqualsBuilder.CompareConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Config that influences comparison Process.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoredProperties
      Root Fields that should be ignored.
      protected boolean ignoreNotFound
      Set to true, if fields that exist for root, but where not found in compare, should be ignored in comparison process
      protected boolean ignoreNull
      Set to true, if root field should be ignored in comparison process, if its value in root is null.
      protected boolean minimalDiff  
      protected java.lang.Class<?> reflectUpToClass  
      protected boolean useNullForNotFound
      Set to true, if fields that exist for root, but where not found in compare, should be included in comparison process with value: null

    • Field Detail

      • ignoreNull

        protected boolean ignoreNull
        Set to true, if root field should be ignored in comparison process, if its value in root is null.

      • ignoreNotFound

        protected boolean ignoreNotFound
        Set to true, if fields that exist for root, but where not found in compare, should be ignored in comparison process

      • useNullForNotFound

        protected boolean useNullForNotFound
        Set to true, if fields that exist for root, but where not found in compare, should be included in comparison process with value: null

      • ignoredProperties

        protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoredProperties
        Root Fields that should be ignored.

      • init

        protected void init​(java.lang.Object root,
                    java.lang.Object compare)
        Called before compare to apply runtime config adjustments. i.E. included Properties are given to superConfig, config now needs class of Root to determine all properties in order to determine ignoredProperties
